params.text: Dogo da Gajere
Baba yana dauko min hula ta
Baba yana da tsayi
Mama tana dauko min riga ta
Baba ya fi Mama tsayi.
Yayata tana dauko min littafi na
Mama ta fi yayata tsayi
Yayana ya dauko min jaka ta
Yayata tafi ƙanina tsayi.
Yayana ya fi ni tsayi.
Na fi kowa gajarta a danginmu
Kai! Na tuno da ɗan karenmu, Jojo.
Jojo ya dauko min takalmi na.
Ha‎-ha! Jojo shine mafi gajerci.
Kwarai! Jojo ya fi ni gajerci.
Na fi yayana gajerci.
Yayana ya fi yayata gajerci.
Yayata ta fi Mama gajerci.
Mama ta fi Baba gajerci.
Laa! Baba ya fi kowa tsayi, yayinda Jojo shi ya fi kowa gajerci.

"Dogo da Gajere" credits

This work, “Dogo da Gajere”, is a derivative of “Ubude nobufushane.” as translated by Celia Bolam used under CC BY.  The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2015. It is based on the original story: 'ខ្ពស់និងទាប', by Huy Chheng Rattana. © Room to Read, 2015. Some changes were made to this work.

“Dogo da Gajere” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
